abstract: Morgan Stanley said on Monday that it has expanded its board by appointing the outgoing chairman of Caterpillar, James W. Owens, as a director.
snippet: Morgan Stanley said on Monday that it has expanded its board by appointing the outgoing chairman of Caterpillar, James W. Owens, as a director.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley said on Monday that it had expanded its board by appointing the departing chairman of Caterpillar, James W. Owens, as a director.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Picks Caterpillar Chairman for Its Board
